tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE reverse_logistics (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  return_order_id INT,
  return_reason TEXT,
  return_date DATE,
  return_status VARCHAR(50),
  return_method VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE ReverseLogistics (
    return_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    return_date DATE,
    return_reason VARCHAR(255),
    customer_id INT,
    product_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE ReverseLogistics (
  return_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  return_date DATE,
  customer_id INT,
  product_id INT,
  reason VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE ReturnCycleTimes (
  return_id INT,
  processing_time INT,
  cycle_start_date DATE,
  cycle_end_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (return_id) REFERENCES ReverseLogistics(return_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ReverseLogisticsOrders (
  order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  order_date DATE,
  returned_items JSONB
)

CREATE TABLE ReturnProcessing (
  return_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  order_id INT,
  return_date DATE,
  return_reason TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE WarehouseInventory (
  item_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  item_name TEXT,
  quantity INT,
  location TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE SupplierRelationships (
  supplier_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  supplier_name TEXT,
  contact_person TEXT,
  contact_email TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE ReturnMetrics (
  metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  return_date DATE,
  return_processing_time INTERVAL,
  return_status TEXT
)
